title: Pretraining is All You Need: A Multi-Atlas Enhanced Transformer Framework for Autism Spectrum Disorder Classification. (arXiv:2307.01759v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: Autism spectrum disorder (ASD) is a prevalent psychiatric condition characterized by atypical cognitive, emotional, and social patterns. Timely and accurate diagnosis is crucial for effective interventions and improved outcomes in individuals with ASD. In this study, we propose a novel Multi-Atlas Enhanced Transformer framework, METAFormer, ASD classification.
